import{GET_ROLE,GET_ROLE_SUCCESS,ADD_USER,ADD_USER_SUCCESS,GET_USER,GET_USER_SUCCESS,DELETE_USER,DELETE_SUCCESS,EDIT_USER,EDIT_SUCCESS,UPDATE_USER,UPDATE_SUCCESS,GET_USER_PARTIES_FOR_USER_MASTER,GET_USER_PARTIES_FOR_USER_MASTER_SUCCESS,GET_EMPLOYEE_FOR_USER_REGISTRATION,GET_EMPLOYEE_FOR_USER_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS}from'./actionType';/// M_Employee
export var getEmployeeForUseRegistration=function getEmployeeForUseRegistration(){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEE_FOR_USER_REGISTRATION};};export var getEmployeeForUseRegistrationSuccess=function getEmployeeForUseRegistrationSuccess(data){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEE_FOR_USER_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS,payload:data};};/// M_Roles
export var getRoles=function getRoles(){return{type:GET_ROLE};};export var getRolesSuccess=function getRolesSuccess(data){return{type:GET_ROLE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};/// Registration Post api
export var addUser=function addUser(data){return{type:ADD_USER,data:data};};export var addUserSuccess=function addUserSuccess(data){return{type:ADD_USER_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//get Registration api
export var getUser=function getUser(){return{type:GET_USER};};export var getUserSuccess=function getUserSuccess(data){return{type:GET_USER_SUCCESS,payload:data};};////delete api
export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(id){return{type:DELETE_USER,id:id};};export var deleteSuccess=function deleteSuccess(data){return{type:DELETE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};///// edit api
export var editUserId=function editUserId(id,pageMode){return{type:EDIT_USER,id:id,pageMode:pageMode};};export var editSuccess=function editSuccess(data){return{type:EDIT_SUCCESS,payload:data};};/// update api
export var updateID=function updateID(data,id){return{type:UPDATE_USER,data:data,id:id};};export var updateSuccess=function updateSuccess(data){return{type:UPDATE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};export var GetUserPartiesForUserMastePage=function GetUserPartiesForUserMastePage(id){return{type:GET_USER_PARTIES_FOR_USER_MASTER,id:id};};export var GetUserPartiesForUserMastePageSuccess=function GetUserPartiesForUserMastePageSuccess(data){return{type:GET_USER_PARTIES_FOR_USER_MASTER_SUCCESS,payload:data};};
